name: places/ChIJl6J54h70wokRrfUbGiOEJ-k
formattedAddress: 325 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 325 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033-4204, USA

originalText.text:
I am truly impressed by Rafaela's professionalism and dedication at this establishment. In my search for excellent waxing service and exceptional customer care, I have found the perfect place! Despite traveling from downtown Manhattan, it's worth it because Rafaela doesn't just provide an excellent, long-lasting wax; she is also caring, sweet, and makes you feel appreciated as a valued customer.

I must admit, the waxing process requires resilience and strength, but the results are worth it. With Rafaela, you can expect smooth skin that lasts for the entire month without irritation. Not only is she highly skilled, but she also genuinely loves her job, which makes the whole experience even better. If you want a professional who goes above and beyond, Rafaela is the one to go to. I'm more than happy to spend my money on her services!

originalText.text: Very great experience! Rafaela is incredibly efficient with care and attention to detail. Highly recommend. For those who have not had sugaring before, the process is quite different from waxing.

originalText.text: Rafaela is a gem. This type of wax is unique uptown and she gets the job done. I've been going to her for three years. Its convenient and she does a great job. Its not fancy, but she's good at what she does. Another review mentioned heavy handed but honestly I don't want someone who doesn't move quickly and get the job done in a timely matter doing my wax. Rafaela doesn't waste time.

originalText.text: Worst waxing experience ever. Will never go here again. I went off a referral and it was terrible, lady was way too heavy handed. She was just ripping my hairs off, kept telling me to relax when i was in pain and couldn‚Äôt. I was also pregnant so was very sensitive down there. Asked her to please not tweeze at the end it being that i was already in so much pain from her roughness and she told me ‚Äúit‚Äôs her job and she has to do her job‚Äù again told her, ‚Äúno it‚Äôs okay. Kept telling me about how she has years working with skin care and etc. She was rude, in my experience. It was painful and felt just as hurtful as hard wax. It‚Äôs now been 2 weeks and my hairs are already starting to grow back. I‚Äôve sugared before and i last a month and a half without having hair growing back. Don‚Äôt waste your time on going here.
